publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4995 Mr Mark Ruskell: Living Planet Report 2006—That the Parliament notes WWF’s statement on the state of the natural world, The Living Planet Report 2006, which reveals that Scotland ranks 15th in the global league of ecological footprints, meaning that Scots are consuming resources at three times the rate that the planet can renew them, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to make sustainable development its top priority.

S2M-4995 Mr Mark Ruskell: Living Planet Report 2006—That the Parliament notes WWF’s statement on the state of the natural world, The Living Planet Report 2006, which reveals that Scotland ranks 15th in the global league of ecological footprints, meaning that Scots are consuming resources at three times the rate that the planet can renew them, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to make sustainable development its top priority.
S2M-4995 Living Planet Report 2006 (lodged on 24 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
